snippet: Diego Costa scored just 17 minutes into his debut, and Cesc Fàbregas had two assists in a superb display as Chelsea opened its Premier League campaign with a 3-1 win at newcomer Burnley.
abstract: Chelsea defeats Burnley, 3-1, in Premier League soccer opener.
lead_paragraph: Diego Costa scored just 17 minutes into his debut, and Cesc Fàbregas had two assists in a superb display as Chelsea opened its Premier League campaign with a 3-1 win at newcomer Burnley.

headline.main: Costa Helps Lift Chelsea in Premier League Opener
headline.print_headline: Costa Helps Lift Chelsea in Premier League Opener
